caseTitle: MATTER REGARDING NON-IMPLEMENTATION OF THE ORDER OF THIS COURT WITH RESPECT TO DEMARCATION OF PROPERTY
tagline: The exchange of land purportedly encroached by Bahria Town and the Forest Department and attestation of mutations in this behalf being based on erroneous assumption about the area is against law and the record and as such of no effect. Forest Department, Revenue Department and Survey of Pakistan are directed to conduct a fresh demarcation after giving notices to Forest Department and Bahria Town.
